d6:
Matt : Andrew ? I had a strange dream. Or maybe not.
Do you still hear them ?
Andrew : Hear what ?
 Matt : ...never mind.

Andrew : We have to find how to go back. ?
Matt : Go back ? Where ? We're fine here, aren't we ?
Andrew : To our world, Matt. I could come because I found your note, with the reciepe for the formula.

Matt : Me ? I've never wrote anything like this, nor a reciepe.
You didn't read the whole book before coming ?
The last chapter contains the return formula.
Don't tell to me that you didn't wrote it down before coming.

Andrew : So, you had it all the time ?
Matt : It would have been foolish to come here without it !

Andrew : Why wouldn't you come back ?
Matt : Oh, you know... stuff... shiny sand... But you're here.
Will you stay with me ?

Andrew : Ok, let's stay here a little longer. 
Matt : Wonderful  :D !

Andrew : I'd rather go home with you.
Matt : Oh... I'm a bit decived, but ok. Here's the formula.
